_symbol_format: .TICKER YYMMDD P/C STRIKE  (positive qty = buy, negative = sell)
_source: Ravish passive strategies playbook - LEAPS Covered Calls
notes: NVDA LEAPS covered call: long 100 shares at ~191 + sell 200C Jan 2027. Target 30% without leverage, 40% on margin.
rationale: Buy 100 shares of quality stock, sell 30-50 delta covered call 6-12 months out. Income on long-term holdings. Set and forget. Min 20% for mega blue chips. LEAPS duration means larger premium collected.

entry_conditions.iv_environment: Higher IV preferred — more call premium. But don't wait too long, time in market matters.

delta_target.note: 30-50 delta call. Higher delta = more premium but more likely to be called away.

stock_selection.quality: Top individual stocks only. Not indices.
stock_selection.note: These are stocks you want to own. The covered call is income while you hold.

return_targets.without_leverage: Target 30% annualized return (stock appreciation + call premium)
return_targets.min_return_blue_chip: Min 20% for mega blue chips (AAPL, MSFT, NVDA, GOOGL)
return_targets.with_margin: Target 40% of margin as profit. Max 2x leverage.
return_targets.note: Calculate: (call premium + expected stock appreciation to strike) / cost basis

entry_conditions.position_sizing: Full 100 shares per lot. Cash: ~$19,100. Margin (50%): ~$9,550.
entry_conditions.notes: LEAPS Covered Calls: buy 100 shares + sell 30-50 delta covered call 6-12 months. Target 30% without leverage. Min 20% for mega blue chips. 40% on margin. NVDA example: sell 200 strike Jan 2027 call. Set and forget.

pnl_drivers.max_profit: Call strike - stock cost + call premium. Example: (200 - 191) x 100 + call premium ~$2,800 = ~$3,700 on $19,100 = 19% in 11 months.
pnl_drivers.max_loss: Stock cost - call premium (if stock goes to zero). Realistic: stock declines but LEAPS call decays, reducing loss.
pnl_drivers.primary_driver: Call premium income — LEAPS call has significant time value ($28+)
pnl_drivers.secondary_driver: Stock appreciation up to strike price
pnl_drivers.tertiary_driver: Dividends collected while holding shares (if applicable)

greeks_profile.theta: positive — short LEAPS call decays slowly but steadily over months
greeks_profile.vega: negative — short call benefits from IV decrease. LEAPS vega is large.
greeks_profile.delta: positive (long stock ~100 delta, short call ~-35 delta = ~65 net delta)
greeks_profile.gamma: slightly negative — short call gamma is low for LEAPS

exit_rules.profit_target: 30% return on capital. Or close if call is 80%+ decayed and stock near strike.
exit_rules.if_called_away: Happy outcome — sold at profit target (strike). Redeploy with new LEAPS covered call.
exit_rules.if_stock_drops: Hold if thesis intact. Roll call down for more premium if needed.
exit_rules.management: Minimal. Check monthly. Roll if approaching expiry with stock far from strike.

pnl_drivers.ideal_scenario: NVDA rises to 200 by Jan 2027. Called away at 200 for $900 stock profit + $2,800 call premium = $3,700 / $19,100 = 19% return. Redeploy.
